articles.description: As India awaits message from Moon, memories arrive from Mars
articles.content: It's been three days since the Indian space agency ISRO kept their metaphorical eyes and ears wide open, awaiting a signal from the re-awakened Chandrayaan-3. However, there has been no telemetry dat… [+2008 chars]
